meanings.definition: Covered or filled with mire; muddy or boggy.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, the path became the miriest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The miriest part of the field was difficult to cross without getting stuck.
meanings.sent3: The pig happily rolled in the miriest spot, splashing mud everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes were so caked in mud, they resembled the miriest swamp.
meanings.sent5: The miriest puddle in the yard seemed bottomless, swallowing everything that fell in.
